Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

DiskSnapshotName.description: The name of the disk snapshot (e.g., my-disk-snapshot).

DiskSnapshotArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the disk snapshot.

DiskName.description: The name of the source disk from which the snapshot was created.

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

Location.description: The AWS Region and Availability Zone where the disk snapshot was created.

AvailabilityZone.description: The Availability Zone where the disk snapshot was created.

RegionName.description: The AWS Region where the disk snapshot was created.

State.description: The status of the disk snapshot operation.

Progress.description: The progress of the disk snapshot creation operation.

FromDiskName.description: The name of the source disk from which the disk snapshot was created.

SizeInGb.description: The size of the disk snapshot in GB.

IsFromAutoSnapshot.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the snapshot was created from an automatic snapshot.

CreatedAt.description: The timestamp when the disk snapshot was created.

SupportCode.description: The support code. Include this code in your email to support when you have questions about an instance or another resource in Lightsail.
